div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 14:35 pm CDT

div.div: Sunny, with a high near 64. North wind 11 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. North wind around 6 mph becoming calm in the evening.
A slight chance of showers between 10am and 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 65. South wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
